name: Treesource
description:
Build an awesome city and grow your population but be careful not to unsettle the natural balance and cause an apocalypse! The game keeps changing as a cellular automata controls the growth and decline of tree population and the demise of constructions you made.

Select a unit to place with A, S, and D, and place it by clicking on the board, you can rotate the screen by dragging while clicking the right mouse button you can zoom in by scrolling
